description.ko: 수정의 정교함에 사로잡힌 채, 한 줄기 빛이 수천 개의 꿈으로 산산조각 납니다.
description.en: A single beam of light shattered into a thousand dreams, held captive by the precision of crystal.

prompt: A macro view of a giant crystalline snowflake made of high-index diamond-glass, suspended in a dark void where concentrated light rays intersect to create a hyper-complex web of rainbows. Intense spectral dispersion, refractive indices, and chromatic aberration at the crystal facets. 8k, hyper-realistic, raytracing. Sharp focus on the points where light splits into pure energy. Detailed rainbow caustics dance across the glass surfaces. Cinematic lighting captures the prismatic energy trapped within the intricate fractal geometry of the glass structure.
